sentences.sentence: The tensor fascia lata and gluteus medius turn the thigh bone inward, balancing the turning-out force of the gluteus maximus.
sentences.translation: 阔筋膜张肌和臀中肌将大腿骨向内，平衡由臀大肌产生的向外的力量。

sentences.sentence: MRI after THA shows partial disruptions of the gluteus medius, with mucoid signal alterations and fatty degeneration even in asymptomatic patients.
sentences.translation: 甚至在没有症状的患者，术后MRI也显示有臀中肌的部分破坏，伴随着粘蛋白信号的改变和脂肪退变。

sentences.sentence: The gluteus medius on the outside of the pelvis and the adductor group on the inside of the thigh balance the pelvis from the outside to the inside.
sentences.translation: 位于骨盆外侧的臀中肌和大腿内侧的内收肌群共同保持骨盆左右两侧的平衡。
